articles.title: Quantifying SARS-CoV-2 transmission in large urban areas - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: A team of international researchers used mobility information and socio-demographic data to build a model of SARS-CoV-2 transmission to understand where, when, and how many transmission events occurred in the first wave of the pandemic in the United States.
